event_registry_properties.name: action
event_registry_properties.item: Schedule a repair action to replace the affected Field Replaceable Unit (FRU), the identity of which can be determined using fmdump -v -u EVENT_ID. Please consult the detail section of the knowledge article for additional information.
event_registry_properties.name: description
event_registry_properties.item: A non-fatal uncorrectable error occurred on the interface between a MBC chip and a SC chip.
event_registry_properties.name: details
event_registry_properties.item:
A non-fatal uncorrectable error occurred on the interface between a MBC chip and a SC chip.

Any of the domains may panic due to this fault, by getting an uncorrectable error
when communicating with the XSCF.

No immediate action is taken by SCF software due to this fault.

If the domain software does not panic, then the domain will continue operating normally.


   SPARC Enterprise M3000 platform:

     The JSC chip replaces both the SC chip and the MAC chip.
     The motherboard contains the JSC chip.
     The platform is unbootable.


   SPARC Enterprise M4000 platform:

      Platform will gradually become unbootable as domains try to reboot.


   SPARC Enterprise M5000 platform:

      One-half the Motherboard with the MBC chip is deconfigured after the platform is power cycled
      or after the domains using the one-half the Motherboard reboot
      or after a Dynamic Reconfiguration operation is performed.


   SPARC Enterprise M8000/M9000 platforms:

      CMU is deconfigured after the platform is power cycled
      or after the domains using the CMU reboot
      or after a Dynamic Reconfiguration operation is performed.




The recommended service action for this event is to schedule the replacement of the affected FRU's.

       LEGEND

      RED        = SUNW-MSG-ID
      BLUE     = EVENT_ID
      GREEN  = FRU


Step 1. Collect the fault message (use one of the following methods):


   Single-line fault message displayed on the XSCF console:

   Mar 20 21:21:16 san-ff2-21-0 fmd: SOURCE: sde, REV: 1.12, CSN: 7860000772  
   EVENT-ID: c2dc07ff-6678-4287-986b-7bc3c61d6dda
   Refer to %FMAURL%/SCF-8003-JP for detailed information.


   Complete fault message using 'fmdump -m' on the XSCF console:

   MSG-ID: SCF-8003-JP, TYPE: Fault, VER: 1, SEVERITY: Critical
   EVENT-TIME: Tue Mar 20 21:21:15 UTC 2007
   PLATFORM: SPARC-Enterprise, CSN: 7860000772, HOSTNAME: san-ff2-21-0
   SOURCE: sde, REV: 1.12
   EVENT-ID: c2dc07ff-6678-4287-986b-7bc3c61d6dda
   DESC: A non-fatal uncorrectable error occurred on the interface between a MBC chip and a SC chip.
   Refer to %FMAURL%/SCF-8003-JP for more information.
   AUTO-RESPONSE: No immediate action is taken by XSCF software due to this fault.
   Resources associated with the faulty FRU will be deconfigured after the platform is
   power cycled or after the domain reboots or after a Dynamic Reconfiguration operation
   is performed. This resource deconfiguration may cause the platform to become
   unbootable. Please consult the detail section of the knowledge article for additional information.
   IMPACT: The non-fatal uncorrectable error trap may cause the domain to panic.
   REC-ACTION: Schedule a repair action to replace the affected Field Replaceable Unit (FRU),
   the identity of which can be determined using fmdump -v -u EVENT_ID.
   Please consult the detail section of the knowledge article for additional information.


Step 2. Collect the output from the 'fmdump -v -u EVENT_ID' command

   
   SPARC Enterprise platform example:
 
   xscf> fmdump -v -u c2dc07ff-6678-4287-986b-7bc3c61d6dda

         TIME                 UUID                                 MSG-ID
         Mar 20 21:21:15.9019 c2dc07ff-6678-4287-986b-7bc3c61d6dda SCF-8003-JP
           66%  fault.chassis.SPARC-Enterprise.if.se-mbc-sc

                Problem in: hc:///chassis=0/cmu=0/mbc=0
                   Affects: hc:///chassis=0/cmu=0
                       FRU: hc://:product-id=SPARC-Enterprise:chassis-id=7860000772:
                            server-id=san-ff2-21-0:
                            part=CA20393-B50X 001AA:revision=0101/component=/MBU_B

           33%  fault.chassis.SPARC-Enterprise.if.se-mbc-sc

                Problem in: hc:///chassis=0/cmu=0/sc=0
                   Affects: hc:///chassis=0/cmu=0
                       FRU: hc://:product-id=SPARC-Enterprise:chassis-id=7860000772:
                            server-id=san-ff2-21-0:
                            part=CA20393-B50X 001AA:revision=0101/component=/MBU_B



Step 3. Contact your Authorized Service Provider.



If you require additional information, please refer to InfoDoc #87402.
event_registry_properties.name: impact
event_registry_properties.item: The non-fatal uncorrectable error trap may cause the domain to panic.
event_registry_properties.name: response
event_registry_properties.item: No immediate action is taken by XSCF software due to this fault. Resources associated with the faulty FRU will be deconfigured after the platform is power cycled or after the domain reboots or after a Dynamic Reconfiguration operation is performed. This resource deconfiguration may cause the platform to become unbootable. Please consult the detail section of the knowledge article for additional information.
event_registry_properties.name: title
event_registry_properties.item: Non-fatal uncorrectable error occurred on the interface between a MBC chip and a SC chip.
